texts: There will be some amendments to public transport over the Spring Bank Holiday weekend period - 29 to 31 May - as follows:

Normal bus services will operate on Saturday and Sunday, 29 and 30 May. On Monday 31 May a Sunday service will operate. Route H20 (which does not normally operate on a Sunday) will run during shopping hours between Ivybridge, Tesco and Hounslow Civic Centre on Monday.
Mobility Buses will not operate on Monday 31 May.
The scheme does not operate on Bank Holidays.

Saturday 29 May:
A normal Saturday service will mostly operate on all lines.

Due to engineering work, buses will replace trains on the Central line between Woodford and Epping. On the Jubilee line there is no service between Stratford and North Greenwich.A limited replacement bus service will operate between Canary Wharf and Stratford calling at all stations except North Greenwich.Customers are advised to use Central Line, Docklands Light Rail or C2c services.

Sunday 30 May:
A normal Sunday service will mostly operate on all lines.

Due to engineering work, buses will replace trains on the Central line between Woodford and Epping. On the Jubilee line there is no service between Stratford and North Greenwich.A limited replacement bus service will operate between Canary Wharf and Stratford calling at all stations except North Greenwich.Customers are advised to use Central Line, Docklands Light Rail or C2c services.

Spring Bank Holiday Monday 31 May :
A Saturday service will mostly operate on all lines.

Due to engineering work, buses will replace trains on the Central line between Woodford and Epping. On the Jubilee line there is no service between Stratford and North Greenwich.A limited replacement bus service will operate between Canary Wharf and Stratford calling at all stations except North Greenwich.Customers are advised to use Central Line, Docklands Light Rail or C2c services.
There will be no service on the Waterloo & City line.
Borough, Cannon Street, Chancery Lane, Mornington Crescent and Temple stations will be closed all day.
Thames Clippers will run a weekend service and Riverside Launches will not run. All other services as normal.
For 24-hour information on all London travel, please call: 020 7222 1234
